-  GET /v1/appStoreVersionExperimentTreatmentLocalizations/{id}/relationships/appScreenshotSets 

Web Service Endpoint# GET /v1/appStoreVersionExperimentTreatmentLocalizations/{id}/relationships/appScreenshotSets

App Store Connect API 3.6+## [URL](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-appstoreversionexperimenttreatmentlocalizations-_id_-relationships-appscreenshotsets#url)



```
GET https://api.appstoreconnect.apple.com/v1/appStoreVersionExperimentTreatmentLocalizations/{id}/relationships/appScreenshotSets
```

## [Path Parameters](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-appstoreversionexperimenttreatmentlocalizations-_id_-relationships-appscreenshotsets#path-parameters)

`id``string` (Required) 

## [Query Parameters](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-appstoreversionexperimenttreatmentlocalizations-_id_-relationships-appscreenshotsets#query-parameters)

`limit``integer`

 Maximum: `200`## [Response Codes](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-appstoreversionexperimenttreatmentlocalizations-_id_-relationships-appscreenshotsets#response-codes)

` 200 OK``[AppStoreVersionExperimentTreatmentLocalizationAppScreenshotSetsLinkagesResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/appstoreversionexperimenttreatmentlocalizationappscreenshotsetslinkagesresponse)`OK`
